markdownRemark.html:
I did not write anything in the past 10 days, due to craving knowledge in a number of different disciplines.

I used to think that I know everything but the funny thing that I was puzzled for months was I still suffer from a lot of my decisions. It just dawned to me that I haven’t scratched an inch of the universe’s potential.

I’m building skills for the future. Now I’m deep diving on everything about the environment. I’m studying Global Sustainability Management at the Technical University of Denmark. I’m 40% done already and hopefully finish it before I get a job overseas.

I also realized how hard it is to write stuff that matters. That also forced me to do a course on writing.

Focusing on strengths was the theme of my professional career as an accountant. I am tech savy and hyper productive. But these are my strengths, being good at these areas do maintain my edge but does not elevate it. That is why I am exploring my weaknesses for the past six months. I just want to remove my own hard limits as I want to adapt to a technological future that is coming much sooner than most think.
